Analysis of historical data: The expert may have examined historical records of absentee ballot requests in Florida to determine if there has been a consistent pattern of automatically providing ballots to those who have requested them in the past.
Comparison with existing laws and regula: The expert might have reviewed the relevant laws and regulations in Florida regarding absentee ballots to verify if there is any provision that mandates automatic issuance of ballots to all previous requesters.
Verification from official sources: The expert could have contacted election officials or government agencies responsible for managing absentee ballots in Florida to confirm the authenticity of the claim and gather information on any changes in the process.
Cross: referencing with other studies or expert opinions: The expert may have consulted other studies, reports, or opinions from credible sources in the field of election administration to validate the claim and ensure that it aligns with established practices or recommendations.
